name: BRV No.238
description:
Backstory:

a spaceship left for Jupiter's moon Titan. Aboard the spaceships were some engineers and scientists who wanted to create a robot for wars on earth. If any accidents occurred earth wouldn't be threatened which is why they chose Titan for the robot facility. The robots they made are known as BRV's which is a short form of Braves.

You are the 238 BRV, navigate through the small map and destroy all the BadBots while not harming the InnoBots. the choice to kill is up to you.

Made By: MassedUp

For The: Minijam 77: Bravery

Updates on fixing bugs and adding features will be done soon!

devlog will be out soon at:
